resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107283</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207092</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">From Slavery to Civil Rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von der Sklaverei rechts Zivil$$ln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De l'esclavage vers des droits civiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Do slavery às direita civis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da slavery ai diritti civili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη σκλαβιά στα αστικά δικαιώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De esclavitud a las derechas civiles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a timeline of African-American history. Photos, broadsides, maps, and other items are organized around time periods: slavery, abolition, antebellum, Civil War, reconstruction, progressive era, World War I, between the wars, World War II, and civil rights.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein timeline der Afrikanisch-Amerikanischen 
Geschichte. Fotos, broadsides, Karten und andere Einzelteile 
werden um Zeitabschnitte organisiert: Sklaverei, Aufhebung, 
antebellum, Bürgerkrieg, Rekonstruktion, progressive Ära, Erster 
Weltkrieg, zwischen den Kriegen, dem Zweiten Weltkrieg und den 
Zivilrechten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une chronologie de l'histoire afro-américaine. 
Des photos, par le travers, les cartes, et d'autres éléments sont
organisés autour des périodes de temps : esclavage, abolition,
guerre d'avant-guerre et civile, reconstruction, ère progressive, 
Première Guerre Mondiale, entre les guerres, la deuxième guerre 
mondiale, et les droits civiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um timeline do history Africano-Americano. 
As fotos, os broadsides, os mapas, e outros artigos são 
organizados em torno dos períodos de tempo: slavery, abolition,
guerra antebellum, civil, reconstruction, era progressiva, 
world.war.i, entre as guerras, a segunda guerra mundial, e as direitas
civis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un timeline di storia Africano-Americana. 
Le foto, gli attacchi, i programmi ed altri articoli sono 
organizzati intorno ai periodi di tempo: slavery, abolizione, 
guerra antebellum e civile, ricostruzione, era progressiva, 
world.war.i, fra le guerre, la seconda guerra mondiale ed i diritti 
civili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο της 
αφρικανικός-αμερικανικής ιστορίας. Οι φωτογραφίες, 
broadsides, οι χάρτες, και άλλα αντικείμενα οργανώνονται γύρω 
στα χρονικά διαστήματα: σκλαβιά, κατάργηση, προπολεμικός, 
εμφύλιος πόλεμος, αναδημιουργία, προοδευτική εποχή, παγκόσμιος 
πόλεμος Ι, μεταξύ των πολέμων, του παγκόσμιου πολέμου ΙΙ, και των
αστικών δικαιωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un timeline de la historia Africano-Americana. 
Las fotos, los costados, las correspondencias, y otros items 
se ordenan alrededor de períodos: esclavitud, abolición, 
guerra antebellum, civil, reconstrucción, era progresiva, Primera 
Guerra Mundial, entre las guerras, la Segunda Guerra Mundial, y las 
derechas civiles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207092</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107283</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/from-slavery-to-civil-rights</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
